p: The stem parts were cut into small pieces and dried. After complete drying, the dried plant material was powdered by a mechanical grinder. The powdered plant (200 g) material was then extracted with 800 mL of distilled water. The whole mixture was macerated overnight and filtered. The filtrate was evaporated to eliminate water and to obtain the extract in dried form. A fresh solution was prepared from the dried residue in each day of treatment.
